name: Urchins and Ink
description:
Urchins & Ink is a platform for learning languages not based on Roman alphabets (syllabic/logographic). Absolute beginners can learn Japanese with Sumi and the sea urchins! Language learning is challenge criteria; the more you know, the greater advantage.
-Japanese hiragana/katakana alphabet
-92 total symbols split into 9 vocabulary modules
-Playable in 5 dynamic game modes
-DLC to unlock more stages
